abstract: During the bank’s conference call, Mike Mayo of Crédit Agricole Securities said tried to ask a question, but Fifth Third didn’t call on him. The bank said it was all a misunderstanding.
snippet: During the bank’s conference call, Mike Mayo of Crédit Agricole Securities said tried to ask a question, but Fifth Third didn’t call on him. The bank said it was all a misunderstanding.
lead_paragraph: Mike Mayo, the maverick bank analyst of Crédit Agricole Securities, is not exactly Mr. Popularity on Wall Street.

headline.main: Analyst Says He Was Stifled by Fifth Third
